It's important to be proactive increasing cloud awareness and making it possible to understand and communicate the advantages of cloud tech and value which EPAM-led cloud transformation brings to our clients.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why? CEO Arkadiy Dobkin emphasized the importance of cloud-compatible thinking and cloud-oriented solutions as one of the definite trends for EPAM and the industry in the near future.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cloud migration is the way forward for many platforms and apps to survive in the ever-changing environment of modern \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You need to choose \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"one of them\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" according to your work specifics or your preference. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These brief (5 hrs. each) well-structured courses created by EPAM colleagues will help you explore cloud services that EPAM provides, operate cloud-related terminology and become more confident while working with cloud tech.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After the course completion, you’ll be able to better connect with the clients within cloud-driven projects and will have a foundation for further learning in the field of cloud tech. It will become a good first step towards increasing the number of options for your personal and professional growth at TR Account and in EPAM in general.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
